turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. I've been trying to call for days but can't get through!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you with that. To schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, could you please provide your full name, date of birth, and insurance information?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my name is John Smith, date of birth is 03/15/1988, and my insurance is Blue Cross Blue Shield, member ID is ABC12345.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Mr. Smith. Just one moment while I access Dr. Ramirez's schedule. Okay, it looks like he has availability on Tuesday the 27th at 10:00 AM or Thursday the 29th at 2:30 PM. Does either of those times work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, those are both tricky. What's the *earliest* appointment he has? I really need to be seen soon. Is there any chance he has cancellations that I could take advantage of?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me see. I can put you on the cancellation list, and we'll notify you if something opens up sooner. Regarding the earliest appointment, outside of the listed times, the next available is actually the 27th of next month, also at 10 am. Would you like to be put on the cancellation list, or would you like to schedule the appointment for the 27th of next month or one of the initially offered times?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, fine. Put me on the cancellation list and schedule me for the 27th of next month at 10 am. Thanks, I guess.
